comments.author: @alexandersamoil4548
comments.text:
So a little context from someone who actually watched a few seasons of Masterchef Canada and read about the production.

Basically, they wanted their own Gordon Ramsay in season 1, this is why you see him acting the way he was, throwing the food, getting angry, etc. And that’s not his personality at all, that’s just what the producers wanted. And it didn’t work obviously, so starting from season 2 they stopped pushing him to be more like somebody else and just let him be himself.

And what do you know, his true self is a very nice guy, polite and a good critic
